voicelines.text: The door over there is the correct one. The one im pointing at.
Open the door with the breathing.
Open the door with the grownling.
It's right. Proceed right.
Continue... Right...
All ways are bad. Proceed back.
Turn right. Then left. Then straight.
Go up.
Head south.
Head north.
The correct door is to the left, right, left, right, up, down, up, down, B, A, Start.
MORON!!!!
You're still alive! That's uh... That's good.
Your stupidity continues to amaze me.
You are so goddamn gullible.
Here! This way! Wait, nononono! I meant the other door. I'm really sorry...
Oh... I'm sorry... I didn't think you'd actually fall for it...
Seriously!? How are you this stupid?
You guys see that? That'll be you soon. Take care now~
The rest of you lot can consider yourselves lucky! I'll get you next time...
Better him than you, am I right?
I'm sorry it had to end this way.
No, wait! I'm sorry! Are you okay? Hello?
I really didn't mean to! Please... Please wake up...
Better hope you're bulletproof, buddy!
Hey! Check out what I got!
Say hello to my little friend!
I'm holding all the cards, and guess what? THEY'RE ALL FULL HOUSES! Never played cards, meaning to learn.
Would you like to partake in my newest art project? I'll paint these walls with your blood.
Don't worry, it's filled with blanks! *Totally*.
Let's make this quick. He still needs more time.
Ever seen the back of a Wall Dweller? That'll be you in a few seconds.
Plllease watch out for the turrets. They hurt pretty bad, yknow.
You had it coming, don't make this harder than it has to be.
You see those red lasers? you should touch them.
He... can't get us out if you continue to stand in our way.
Just... Give up... Stop resisting...
*Urrrgh*. COME OOON! YOU'RE NO FUN AT ALL!!
*Aeeruggg*. COME OOON! YOU'RE NO FUN AT ALL!!
*Aeeruggg*. You're BOOOORING!!!
Listen pal. We all wanna get out of here. But it's either you, or me.
Man, the security in this place *sssucks*. *Good for you*.
Line em up! Then knock em down!
Aww man! Dead already?
*HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!* Too easy!
*Hey. Hey! Look out the window~*
Hehehe. I think we got company.
Ever get the feeling something baad is gonna happen? *Hehe* Well, you're right!
Hey, good luck!
Surprise!!! Have fun!!!
Hey! Wanna see something funny?
You hear that? I think something is on its way!
\*Eugh\* Get out here, and FIGHT!
Don't you get it? Come out here, and FIGHT!
STOP HIDING!
Please. Come out of hiding. End this. For my sake.
QUIT BEING A COWARD!
You think you can wait this out? Quit cowering.

\**Ooooooouuuuhhh*\* A visitor! Don't get those often, especially recently. Before you start accusing me of whatever, I don't hate you. It's nothing personal, no idea who you are. It's... just Sebastian. You've seen the guy around before, haven't you? He said he would help me. He, PROMISED he would get the two of us out of here. Our shared prison. So he asked me to delay the retrival of the Crystal for as long as possible. I'm sorry for any... inconvenience I might have caused in the process. I... don't want to go back to Roblux mining... It's soo... mind numbing I... can't bear it longer... I just want to make art again... Sebastian will come back for me whenever he finds a way out. He just has to.
Bye for now...
Oh! Hi! Um, Sebastian didn't have any updates for me, did he? Can you send my regards?
If it isn't my WORST pal!
\**Eugh*\* What do YOU want?
Aaaaand STAY OUT!!!
Byeeee! Thanks for hanging out with me!!!
If you compare me to that ANNOYING knock off toy, you're dead to me.
Say hi to Sebastian for me if you see him!
Goodbye! I'll miss you!
You're wasting your time.
Hey.
Oh my GOD, MAKE YOUR MIND ALREADY!
Are you trying to tick me off or something?
Damn, sooner than I thought.
